'''Stephanie Schiffer''' is the girl [[Terry]] hired in [[Season 2|season 2]] to sing in [[Central Perk]], causing resentment by [[Phoebe Buffay|Phoebe]].

She is played by rock legend [[Chrissie Hynde]] of [http://lyrics.wikia.com/Pretenders The Pretenders].
